what.title: What is ShareJSON?
what.content: ShareJSON is an innovative platform for sharing and storing JSON files. The application allows developers and system administrators to manage, store, and share data in JSON format in an easy and convenient way.

who.title: Who is it for?
who.content: The application is designed for developers, system administrators, QA teams, and anyone who works with JSON files. Through the user-friendly interface, even non-technical users can enjoy the benefits of structured data management.
